creator: martin@algesten.com
text:
A tag in a taglib is defined as:
  <tag>
    <name>invalid-parameter</name>
...

The hyphen in the tagname will screw the JSP compilation. This is beacause of a variable name that is auto generated from the tag name:
"jspx_th_taglab_invalid-parameter_0". 
Hyphens are not allowed in variable names.
*** Bug 1460 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com

text: We need more work on name mangling, probably in a future version of jasper.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com

text:
This is fixed in the current nightly Tomcat 3.3.x and will appear in the
next Tomcat 3.3.1 release.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
